summary: REQ-13 and REQ-14 appear implemented in HeroSection and TopNav via updated headline text and circular logo styling. REQ-15 is partially implemented by referencing a local background image with readability overlays, but the diff does not show the required new static background asset being added to the repo (no files added). The diff also adds unrequested hero statistics content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the modern welding-themed hero background image as a local static asset (hero-welding-modern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png) and reference it from the hero section (no remote hotlinking).
missing_requirements.reason: HeroSection references /assets/generated/hero-welding-modern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, but the diff shows no added files, so there is no evidence the requested background image asset was actually added as a local static file.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a hero statistics grid (Years Experience, Projects Done, Happy Clients, Services).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked for heading text, circular logo framing, and a modern welding-themed hero background with adequate contrast. It did not request adding new hero content such as a stats grid.
